logging._: all log levels are on the git hub

debug.__: its recommended to keep this on in case a module is outdated / not installed, this doesn't affect production performance, just the boot time.

middleware._: you dont really need cors here, info: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/24611450/cors-do-i-need-it-here

protocol._: this isnt needed since you can just use nginx & cloudflare for ssl and is currently not used but i still provided it optionally for possible use in the future.

mysql._: Z is zulu time e.g. UTC or GMT, you usually dont wanna change it buy if you do want to, go ahead
mysql.__: if you get the error 'ER_NOT_SUPPORTED_AUTH_MODE' turn insecureAuth on, you probably also have to modify your mysql setting or switch to mysql 5, for more info https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44946270/er-not-supported-auth-mode-mysql-server and https://github.com/fdl-stuff/nashi/issues/1

domains._: dont put the protocol in the domains except for the discord & github :)
